results.title: Tutorial: Azure DDoS Protection simulation testing
results.description: Red Button: work with a dedicated team of experts to simulate real-world DDoS attack scenarios. RedWolf: a self-service or guided DDoS testing provider with real-time control. DDoS Profile Possible values include DNS Flood, N... Test Size Possible values include 100K pps, 50 Mbps and 4 source IPs, 200K pps, 100 Mbps and 8 source IPs, 400K pps,.

results.title: Caching, Object-Object Mapping, Blogs and More
results.description: One of the most popular is memcached (version 1.2.8), a free, open-source option created by Danga Interactive and used on high-profile sites like LiveJournal, Wikipedia, and SourceForge. Memcached has its roots in the LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP), but there are community-created Windows ports and .NET libraries available, along with.

results.title: Data Points - Second-Level Caching in the Entity Framework and AppFabric
results.description: And second-level caching is a commonly used coding pattern for caching data for various uses. Rather than write your own way of caching data, there are caching mechanisms available such as memcached (memcached.org), and even caching support in Microsoft Azure (available in Windows Server as well as in Azure). The InMemoryCache inherits from this,.
